hero.title: About Sukrut
hero.description: We craft digital solutions that transform how businesses operate, scale, and connect with their customers. Every line of code we write serves a purpose beyond technology.

featuredBox.title: Building Tomorrow's Digital Infrastructure
featuredBox.description: Our team combines technical expertise with business acumen to deliver systems that don't just work—they evolve. We understand that great software is built through collaboration, iteration, and a deep commitment to solving real-world challenges.

images.alt: Diverse team members collaborating in a modern office environment
Team members engaged in a collaborative discussion around a table
Team members in a relaxed office lounge setting
Team members presenting and discussing data visualizations

principles.title:
What Drives Us
Forward
principles.description: These core beliefs guide our approach to building software and working with clients. They're not just words—they're the foundation of how we operate.

items.title: Human-Centered Design
items.description: Technology exists to serve people. We prioritize user experience and human needs in every solution we architect.

items.title: Thoughtful Problem Solving
items.description: We take time to understand the root cause before building solutions. Deep understanding leads to better outcomes.

items.title: Continuous Evolution
items.description: The best systems adapt. We build with flexibility and future growth in mind, ensuring your technology scales with your vision.

growth.title:
Partnership Beyond
Projects
growth.quote: Success isn't measured by code alone—it's measured by the impact we create together. When you choose Sukrut, you're not just getting a vendor. You're gaining a partner committed to your long-term success, ready to navigate challenges and celebrate victories alongside you.

image.alt: Diverse team members collaborating around a table with laptops in a modern office

team.title: Meet the Minds Building Sukrut
team.subtitle: A collective of engineers, designers, and strategists who bring diverse perspectives to every challenge.

members.name: Deepak Rajpurohit
members.bio: Deepak is the Chief Executive Officer of Sukrut, a leading software engineering company building scalable solutions for real-world challenges. With over a decade of experience leading technology innovation at global tech companies, he is a recognized expert regularly advising businesses and organizations. He has been instrumental in building robust systems that power business growth and digital transformation.

members.name: Isabella Schmidt
members.bio: Isabella is the Head of Product at Sukrut, driving product strategy and innovation. With extensive experience in product management and user experience design, she ensures that our solutions meet the highest standards of quality and usability. Her expertise in translating business needs into technical solutions has been crucial to our success.

members.name: Himanshu Shekhawat
members.bio: Himanshu is a Senior Software Developer specializing in building reliable, scalable applications that support real-world business and healthcare workflows. With strong expertise across frontend and backend development, he works with technologies like React, FastAPI, and Python to transform complex requirements into clean, high-performance systems. He is known for writing maintainable code, improving system efficiency, and delivering solutions teams and clients can depend on.

members.name: Riya Gandoriya
members.bio: Riya Gandoriya is a Senior Software Developer at Sukrut, specializing in backend development with FastAPI, Node.js, and Salesforce. She focuses on building complex solutions, fostering strong teamwork, and ensuring smooth, timely project delivery.

members.name: Deepak Singh Rathore
members.bio: Deepak Singh Rathore is a QA Lead with over 4 years of industry experience, focused on building dependable software through strong testing practices and cross-functional collaboration. With a background in AI engineering, he brings a deep technical perspective to system behavior, integrations, and edge cases, ensuring quality is embedded throughout the development lifecycle.

members.name: Amit Rajpurohit
members.bio: Amit Rajpurohit is a Python Engineer specializing in FastAPI, Selenium, and automation bot development. He builds scalable backend systems and intelligent workflows, with experience integrating and automating platforms like Salesforce to improve efficiency and business operations.

members.name: Sachin Kumar Swami
members.bio: Sachin Kumar Swami is a Senior React Developer who leverages full-stack technologies to engineer robust, scalable web solutions. He has a strong aptitude for solving complex technical problems through thoughtful system design and optimization. He consistently delivers software that is resilient, efficient, and future-proof.

members.name: Dhairya Yadav
members.bio: Dhairya Yadav builds end-to-end applications that bridge user needs and technical execution. By optimizing frontend responsiveness and backend logic, he delivers scalable solutions that improve performance and drive user engagement.

members.name: Neeraj Sharma
members.bio: Neeraj Sharma is a Full-Stack Developer with experience building scalable, high-performance web applications. He specializes in frontend development using React, Tailwind CSS, and Material UI, and backend development with FastAPI and Node.js to design secure, efficient APIs. He excels at translating business requirements into clean, maintainable solutions while delivering seamless user experiences across the stack.

members.name: Aditya Sharma
members.bio: Aditya Sharma is a Python Developer focused on building automation bots and web applications. He enjoys creating efficient solutions that simplify tasks and improve workflows.

members.name: Jasper Ritesh Ariel
members.bio: Jasper Ritesh Ariel is a Front-end Developer specializing in React.js and Tailwind CSS, with a strong focus on building responsive, user-friendly, and scalable web interfaces. He is passionate about translating designs into high-quality code, optimizing performance, and delivering seamless user experiences.

members.name: Vishal Kumawat
members.bio: Vishal Kumawat is a Full Stack Developer specializing in Python, React.js, Next.js, FastAPI, and Node.js. He builds scalable, high-performance web applications and APIs, focusing on clean architecture, maintainable code, and seamless user experiences across the stack.

members.name: Narendra Singh Khangarot
members.bio: Narendra Singh Khangarot is a React Developer specializing in transforming complex requirements into elegant, scalable solutions. With deep React.js expertise, he focuses on performance optimization, architectural clarity, and maintainability, approaching development with a strategic mindset and commitment to technical excellence.

members.name: Mehul Singh Tanwar
members.bio: Mehul is a MERN Stack Developer at Sukrut Associates, passionate about building modern, user-friendly web applications. He works with MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, and Node.js to turn ideas into reliable, scalable solutions. He enjoys collaborating with teams, learning new technologies, and writing clean code that improves product performance and user experience.

members.name: Jassi Singh
members.bio: Jassi Singh is a Quality Assurance and Salesforce Developer with experience in delivering high-quality software through rigorous testing and building reliable Salesforce solutions. Skilled in test planning, defect tracking, and Salesforce development using Apex, Lightning components, and declarative tools, he focuses on improving system performance through collaboration and attention to detail.

members.name: Priyanshu Upadhyay
members.bio: Priyanshu Upadhyay is a Python Engineer with strong expertise in Selenium automation, backend development, and system integrations. He specializes in Salesforce integration and healthcare technology, including FHIR-based data interoperability, and builds scalable, automation-driven solutions that improve system performance and business workflows.

members.name: Dhruv Pratap Singh
members.bio: Dhruv Pratap Singh is a MERN Stack Developer with strong experience building scalable, production-ready web applications. He focuses on clean architecture, efficient APIs, and delivering high-quality, maintainable solutions aligned with business requirements.

careers.title: Careers
description: At Sukrut, we believe that making a difference is a team effort that spans across our customers, colleagues, and communities.
As a dynamic, fast-growing software engineering company, we are always looking to expand and complement our team with amazing talent from across the globe.

images.alt: Team members collaborating around a laptop
Team working at a conference booth

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To bridge the gap between complex technology and business needs, creating digital solutions that are both powerful and intuitive. We transform technical challenges into competitive advantages.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To become the go-to technology partner for forward-thinking businesses, where every project sets a new standard for what's possible when engineering meets imagination.

values.title: Technical Mastery
values.description: We stay ahead of the curve, mastering emerging technologies while maintaining expertise in proven frameworks.

values.title: Quality Obsession
values.description: Every detail matters. We write clean, maintainable code and build systems designed to last.

values.title: Transparent Communication
values.description: Honest dialogue builds stronger partnerships. We keep you informed every step of the way.

values.title: Results-Driven Approach
values.description: We measure success by the value we deliver—not just the features we ship, but the problems we solve.

cta.title:
Let's Build Something
Extraordinary Together
cta.description: Every great project starts with a conversation. Reach out and let's explore how we can turn your vision into reality with technology that works for you.
